quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
author: James Dean

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
author: T. E. Lawrence

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky; then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of being a butterfly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am a man?
author: Zhuangzi

quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.
author: Joy Page

quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
author: John Barrymore

quote: You can plant a dream.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
author: Eva Green

quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Was it only by dreaming or writing that I could find out what I thought?
author: Joan Didion

quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
author: Usher

quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Sometimes I wake at night in the White House and rub my eyes and wonder if it is not all a dream.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: People are so busy dreaming the American Dream, fantasizing about what they could be or have a right to be, that they're all asleep at the switch. Consequently we are living in the Age of Human Error.
author: Florence King

quote: My dreams were all my own; I accounted for them to nobody; they were my refuge when annoyed - my dearest pleasure when free.
author: Mary Shelley

quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming.
author: Akira Kurosawa
